Login_Intro: Please, enter your email address and password to sign in into your account.
Sign_Up_Intro: Please, fill the form below to create a new account.
Password_Reset_Intro: Fill the field below with your email address and I will send you an email with the instructions to reset your password.
Verify_Intro: You landed in this page because you requested an account. Click the following button to verify your account:
Verify_Success_Text: Welcome to our family, you can now login and enjoy all our features.
Verify_Fail_H1: Something went wrong verifing your acount!
Verify_Fail_Text: We are sorry, but it looks like we are having dificulties to verify your account.
